summary:
- Rewrote scheduler for _Scanner_, changing the task granularity from an entire DAG to each node therein
- Added support for streaming video, which enables direct access to memory data in addition to disk
- Developed an object detection app as an example of using _Scanner_ with Tensorflow
title: Scanner

summary: Developed a compiler for Decaf (a strongly-typed, object-oriented language) written in Java
title: Decaf Compiler - Project for Compilers course

summary:
- Developed an HTTP proxy in Python to simulate a simplified video CDN system
- Implemented adaptive bitrate selection in the HTTP proxy
- Managed to offer best available bitrate based on the connection’s current throughput
title: Virtual Video CDN - Project for Computer Networks course

summary:
- Implemented a parallel renderer in CUDA that draws a large number of colored circles efficiently
- Maintained atomicity and order that are preserved trivially in the sequential implementation
title: A Simple CUDA Renderer - Project for Parallel Programming course

summary:
- Worked with a teammate to develop a WeChat Mini-program to auto-generate meme for photos
- Automatically recognized characteristics of faces (gender, emotions, etc.) using SenseTime API
- Implemented an ”Meme Library” in MySQL to store face characteristics of given memes
title: Meme Generator - HackPKU 2017

summary: - Designed a mobile-controlled spider-like robot that automatically finds paths and avoids obstacles
title: A Six-Legged Smart Bionic Spider - Project for Embedded Systems course
